author: radim.pavlicek@laurinka.com
data:
Place 9 balls in a spiral around the hole, the first one 3 feet and every other one feet further from the hole in a spiral shape.

The drill

Start at the 3 feet and continue to the 11 feet. Than prepare the spiral again and putt from 11 feet back to the 3 feet. The better players should hole 15-18 putts.
